roleset.name: to pull apart, separate forcefully
roleset.note: TEAR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tear' based on WSJ; adjectival 'torn' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls break-45.1, hurt-40.8.3-1-1, split-23.2. (from tear.01-v)
TORN-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from torn.01-j)

example.name: tear-v: torn out
example.text: Republican Sen. William Cohen of Maine , the panel 's vice chairman , said of the disclosure that `` [a text]-1 torn [*]-1 out of context is a pretext ... ''

example.name: tear-v: torn between
example.text: Further , [the Herald]-1 seemed * torn [*-1]editorially between keeping its old-time Hearst readership -- blue-collar and sports-oriented -- and trying to provide a sprightly , upscale alternative to the sometimes staid Times .
example.arg: between keeping its old-time Hearst readership -- blue-collar and sports-oriented -- and trying to provide a sprightly , upscale alternative to the sometimes staid Times

example.name: tear-v: with direction
example.text: With Garpian randomness , a hotel across the street , the Amfac , had been hit harder : [A large sheet of its concrete facade and several window balconies]-2 were torn [*-2]away .

example.name: tear-v: all args
example.text: John tore all the pages out of Mary's cookbooks because she kept setting the kitchen on fire.
example.arg: because she kept setting the kitchen on fire

example.name: torn-j
example.text: I am really torn [*ICH*-1] at the moment [whether to let things carry on , or to walk away]-1 .

roleset.name: to rush, move hurriedly, rushing
roleset.note: TEAR-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. (from tear.02-v)

example.name: tear-v
example.text: A series of explosions tore through the huge Phillips Petroleum Co. plastics plant near here , [*] injuring more than a hundred and closing parts of the Houston Ship Channel .
example.arg: through the huge Phillips Petroleum Co. plastics plant near here
[*] injuring more than a hundred and closing parts of the Houston Ship Channel

roleset.name: to fill with tears, filling with tears (crying)

example.name: tear-v: eyes tearing
example.text: [*-1] Having resided in the great state of California for the past seven years , I find it [*EXP*-3]hard [*] to ignore our environmental problems when I start my commute to work with eyes tearing [*RNR*-2] and head aching [*RNR*-2] from the polluted air [*T*-4] ; when I try [*-6] to enjoy the beaches and come home [*-6] covered [*-8] with tar and oil [*T*-5] ; when I hear of numerous deaths related [*] to irresponsible processing of cheese and use of chemicals in fruit growing [*T*-7] .

example.name: tear_up-v: transitive
example.text: On Aug. 1 , the state tore up its controls , and food prices leaped .

example.name: tear_down-v: transitive
example.text: Witnesses shout , scream , pontificate : `` ... a dream that the planet could be saved [*-1]from itself and from the sadistic dumb creatures who-2 [*T*-2]-4 try [*-4] to tear down every decent man who [*T*-3] raises his voice . ''
example.arg: every decent man who [*T*-3] raises his voice

roleset.name: to fill with tears
roleset.note: TEARY-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from teary.03-j)

example.name: teary-j
example.text: *PRO* Getting all teary today because I'm reading about Tove Jansson for a post, and thinking about her makes me feel feelings.
example.arg: because I'm reading about Tove Jansson for a post, and thinking about her makes me feel feelings
